sentences.sContent: Danny could be very jealous and possessive about me.
sentences.sCn: 丹尼会很嫉妒，对我独占欲极强。

synos.tran: 占有的；所有的；所有格的；占有欲强的

remMethod.val: 来自possess (v. 占有， 拥有)

words.tran: 拥有；财产；领地；自制；着迷

trans.tranCn: 占有的；所有的；所有格的；占有欲强的
trans.tranOther: wanting someone to have feelings of love or friendship for you and no one else
an adjective,  pronoun  , or form of a word that shows that something belongs to someone or something
